00035 template <typename T>
00036 ChHashTable<T>::ChHashTable(const HTConfig& Config, ObjectAllocator* allocator) : config_(Config), oa_(allocator){
00037   head_ = new ChHTHeadNode[Config.InitialTableSize_];
00038   stats_.HashFunc_ = Config.HashFunc_;
00039   stats_.TableSize_ = Config.InitialTableSize_;
00040 }

00051 template <typename T>
00052 ChHashTable<T>::~ChHashTable(){
00053   clear();
00054   delete [] head_;
00055 }

00057 /*****************************************************************************/
00068 /*****************************************************************************/
00069 template <typename T>
00070 void ChHashTable<T>::insert(const char *Key, const T& Data){
00071   stats_.Probes_++;
00072   // this calculation of loadfactor was provided by Benjamin Henning,
00073   // and was posted on the CS280 forum in Spring 2014
00074   double loadFactor = static_cast<double>(stats_.Count_ + 1)
00075                     / static_cast<double>(stats_.TableSize_);
00076 
00077   // before inserting, check whether we need to expand the table
00078   if (loadFactor > config_.MaxLoadFactor_)
00079   {
00080     grow();
00081   }
00082 
00083   // insert, now that there is space for the new item
00084   push_front(Data, Key, head_[config_.HashFunc_(Key, stats_.TableSize_)]);
00085 }

00087 /*****************************************************************************/
00098 /*****************************************************************************/
00099 template <typename T>
00100 void ChHashTable<T>::remove(const char *Key){
00101   ChHTHeadNode & slot = head_[config_.HashFunc_(Key, stats_.TableSize_)];
00102   ChHTNode * tosearch = slot.Nodes;
00103   ChHTNode * prev = 0;
00104 
00105   while (tosearch)
00106   {
00107     stats_.Probes_++;
00108     if (!strcmp(Key, tosearch->Key))
00109     {
00110       if (config_.FreeProc_)
00111         config_.FreeProc_(tosearch->Data);
00112       if (!prev)
00113         pop_front(slot);
00114       else
00115         remove_node(prev);
00116       return;
00117     }
00118     prev = tosearch;
00119     tosearch = tosearch->Next;
00120   }
00121 
00122   throw(HashTableException(HashTableException::E_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, "remove: the item was not found."));
00123 }

00125 /*****************************************************************************/
00137 /*****************************************************************************/
00138 template <typename T>
00139 const T& ChHashTable<T>::find(const char *Key) const{
00140   ChHTNode * tosearch = head_[config_.HashFunc_(Key, stats_.TableSize_)].Nodes;
00141   while (tosearch)
00142   {
00143     stats_.Probes_++;
00144     if (!strcmp(tosearch->Key, Key))
00145       return tosearch->Data;
00146 
00147     tosearch = tosearch->Next;
00148   }
00149 
00150   throw(HashTableException(HashTableException::E_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, "find: the item was not found."));
00151 }

00161 /*****************************************************************************/
00162   // 
00163 template <typename T>
00164 void ChHashTable<T>::clear(void){
00165   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < stats_.TableSize_; ++i)
00166   {
00167     while (head_[i].Nodes)
00168     {
00169       if (config_.FreeProc_)
00170         config_.FreeProc_(head_[i].Nodes->Data);
00171       pop_front(head_[i]);
00172     }
00173   }
00174 }

00189   return stats_;

00210 /*****************************************************************************/
00218 /*****************************************************************************/
00219 template <typename T>
00220 void ChHashTable<T>::grow(void){
00221   stats_.Expansions_++;
00222   double factor = std::ceil(stats_.TableSize_ * config_.GrowthFactor_);
00223   unsigned growntablesize = GetClosestPrime(static_cast<unsigned>(factor));
00224   unsigned oldtablesize = stats_.TableSize_;
00225   ChHTHeadNode * grown = new ChHTHeadNode[growntablesize];
00226   stats_.TableSize_ = growntablesize;
00227   for (unsigned i = 0; i < oldtablesize; ++i)
00228   {
00229 
00230     while(head_[i].Nodes)
00231     {
00232       stats_.Probes_++;
00233       //grown->insert(head_[i].Nodes->Key, head_[i].Nodes->Data);
00234        push_front(head_[i].Nodes->Data, head_[i].Nodes->Key, 
00235          grown[config_.HashFunc_(head_[i].Nodes->Key, stats_.TableSize_)]);
00236        pop_front(head_[i]);
00237 
00238     }
00239   }
00240 
00241   stats_.TableSize_ = growntablesize;
00242   delete [] head_;
00243 
00244   head_ = grown;
00245 }

00247 /*****************************************************************************/
00259 /*****************************************************************************/
00260 template <typename T>
00261 void ChHashTable<T>::push_front(const T& Data, const char * Key, ChHTHeadNode &list){
00262   ChHTNode * topush;
00263   ChHTNode * trav = list.Nodes;
00264 
00265   while(trav)
00266   {
00267     stats_.Probes_++;
00268     if (!strcmp(trav->Key, Key))
00269     {
00270       throw(HashTableException(HashTableException::E_DUPLICATE, "push_front: the item to insert was a duplicate."));
00271     }
00272     trav = trav->Next;
00273   }
00274   try
00275   {
00276     if (oa_)
00277       topush = new (oa_->Allocate()) ChHTNode(Data);
00278     else
00279       topush = new ChHTNode(Data);
00280   }
00281   catch (const std::exception)
00282   {
00283     throw(HashTableException(HashTableException::E_NO_MEMORY, "push_front: out of memory"));
00284   }
00285 
00286   strcpy(topush->Key, Key);
00287 
00288   topush->Next = list.Nodes;
00289   list.Nodes = topush;
00290   stats_.Count_++;
00291 }

00293 /*****************************************************************************/
00303 /*****************************************************************************/
00304 template <typename T>
00305 void ChHashTable<T>::pop_front(ChHTHeadNode &list){
00306   ChHTNode * temp = list.Nodes;
00307 
00308   list.Nodes = list.Nodes->Next;
00309 
00310   if (oa_)
00311     oa_->Free(temp);
00312   else
00313     delete temp;
00314 
00315   stats_.Count_--;
00316 }

00318 /*****************************************************************************/
00328 /*****************************************************************************/
00329 template <typename T>
00330 void ChHashTable<T>::remove_node(ChHTNode * &prev){
00331   ChHTNode * toremove = prev->Next;
00332 
00333   // unlink the node to remove
00334   prev->Next = prev->Next->Next;
00335   // delete the node to remove
00336   if (oa_)
00337     oa_->Free(toremove);
00338   else
00339     delete toremove;
00340 
00341   // decrement node count
00342   stats_.Count_--;
00343 }
